BillExists.Description: This function returns a logical value, to check if there is any specified bills are present for the associated party in the list of bills or not.
BillExists.Name: BillExists

BillObject.Description: This function when from the taxobject allocation object then it gives the method value from the selected linkmaster Bill Object else it  gives the method value from the Bill object.
BillObject.Name: BillObject

BudgetValue.Description: This function gives the Budgeted Value of the specified Object.
BudgetValue.Name: BudgetValue

BuyTransRate.Description: This function gives the transaction rate of exchange value for a date.If no value is specified it gives the rate for last date before the specified date.
BuyTransRate.Name: BuyTransRate

CashAccountName.Description: This function provides the name of the first Cash Ledger from the current company or the specified company. It returns the first Cash Ledger when in the context of Ledger Object.
CashAccountName.Name: CashAccountName

ChequeNumExists.Description: This function returns a logical value, to check if there is any specified cheques are present for the associated Ledger or not.
ChequeNumExists.Name: ChequeNumExists

ClientEvaluate.Description: This function is used to evaluate a formula at run time on client only. This formula will be evaluated dynamically at the time of usage.
ClientEvaluate.Name: ClientEvaluate

ClientServerString.Description: It returns the mode in which Current instance of Tally is running, ie Server with ODBC, Server without ODBC, Client with ODBC, Client without ODBC etc.
ClientServerString.Name: ClientServerString

CompanyRemUserName.Description: It returns the name of Remote user logged in for accessing remote company.
CompanyRemUserName.Name: CompanyRemUserName

CompanyValue.Description: This function retrieves the value of a method from one company to another. It accepts two parameters. The  first one is the object name representing the Company  and second one represents the Method of that object.
CompanyValue.Name: CompanyValue

CurrentValue.Description: This function provides the amount as per the value stated for the current date.
CurrentValue.Name: CurrentValue

DateFrom.Description: This function returns the date from which the period starts. This is particularly useful when it is required to compare the given date with the start date of the period.
DateFrom.Name: DateFrom

DateTo.Description: This function returns the date with which the period ends. This is particularly useful when it is required to compare given date with the end date of the period.
DateTo.Name: DateTo

DecryptStr.Description: This function returns decrypted string using 3DES (Triple Data Encription Standard) algorithm.
DecryptStr.Name: DecryptStr

EncryptStr.Description: This function returns encrypted string using 3DES (Triple Data Encription Standard) algorithm.
EncryptStr.Name: EncryptStr

EncryptURLStr.Description: This function encrypts using DES (Data Encription Standard) algorithm and returns URLEncoded string.
EncryptURLStr.Name: EncryptURLStr

EvalParamExp.Description: This function evaluates the system-formula for the parameter that is specified using the function Param. This helps to avoid creating multiple formulas for the similar purpose.
EvalParamExp.Name: EvalParamExp

Evaluate.Description: This function is used to evaluate a formula at run time. This formula will be evaluated dynamically at the time of usage.
Evaluate.Name: Evaluate

ExciseExists.Description: This function is used to check whether an Excise Bill exists for a particular party ledger of a particular stock item for a specified bill number.
ExciseExists.Name: ExciseExists

ExclEvaluate.Description: This function is used to evaluate an expression exclusively i.e., without setting dependencies.
ExclEvaluate.Name: ExclEvaluate

ExecNatLangQuery.Description: This function executes a Natural Language Query and returns the result.
ExecNatLangQuery.Name: ExecNatLangQuery

FileGetActiveSheetName.Description: Returns the name of the active sheet in the workbook
FileGetActiveSheetName.Name: FileGetActiveSheetName

FileGetColumnIdx.Description: Returns the Column index given the column name
FileGetColumnIdx.Name: FileGetColumnIdx

FileGetColumnName.Description: Returns the column name given the column Index
FileGetColumnName.Name: FileGetColumnName

FileGetSheetCount.Description: Returns the number of sheet present in the active workbook
FileGetSheetCount.Name: FileGetSheetCount

FileGetSheetIdx.Description: Returns the Index of the sheet provided the sheet name
FileGetSheetIdx.Name: FileGetSheetIdx

FileGetSheetName.Description: Returns the name of the sheet provided the Sheet index
FileGetSheetName.Name: FileGetSheetName

FileIsEOF.Description: Checks whether EOF has been reached or not.
FileIsEOF.Name: FileIsEOF

FileRead.Description: This function reads the specified number of characters from the current file position. If number of parameters is not specified, file is read till end-of-line or end-of-file. While reading line special characters like, Quote, Line continuation (+) etc. are considered. Also the leading and lagging line spaces are removed
FileRead.Name: FileRead

FileReadCell.Description: Returns the data present in the cell specified
FileReadCell.Name: FileReadCell

FileReadRaw.Description: This function reads the specified number of characters from the current file position. If number of parameters is not specified, file is read till end-of-line or end-of-file. This function does not consider any special characters excluding end-of-line
FileReadRaw.Name: FileReadRaw

FileSize.Description: This function gives the size of given file.
FileSize.Name: FileSize

FindGSTVoucher.Description: This function used to find if any matching Inward /Outward Vouchers for given GSTIN and Number. The function returns comma separated list of matching Voucher IDs.
FindGSTVoucher.Name: FindGSTVoucher

FromValue.Description: This function is used to get value of a method in between a given date range($$FromValue:Date and $$ToValue:Date).This function is always used along with $$ToValue.
FromValue.Name: FromValue

GetEnvVar.Description: This function is used to get the value of the environment variable.
GetEnvVar.Name: GetEnvVar

GetFileFullPath.Description: This function returns the full file path for specifed relative file path.
GetFileFullPath.Name: GetFileFullPath

GetMsWordData.Description: This function Gives the text of microsoft word
GetMsWordData.Name: GetMsWordData

GetMsWordHtml.Description: This function Gives the html of microsoft word
GetMsWordHtml.Name: GetMsWordHtml

GetNoOfConfigUserTDLs.Description: This function returns the number of TDLs configured.
GetNoOfConfigUserTDLs.Name: GetNoOfConfigUserTDLs

GetNoOfDisabledUserTDLs.Description: This function returns the number of TDLs disabled.
GetNoOfDisabledUserTDLs.Name: GetNoOfDisabledUserTDLs

GetValueFromKeyValueMap.Description: This function is used to evaluate the expression defined for a given key in the Key value map definition
GetValueFromKeyValueMap.Name: GetValueFromKeyValueMap

HelpModuleMapID.Description: This function is used to retrieve Help Map Id of the nearest UI element in context e.g. Field, Report, Menu.
HelpModuleMapID.Name: HelpModuleMapID

HTTPInfo.Description: This function is used to retrieve details of URL and other information available due to SOAP request.
HTTPInfo.Name: HTTPInfo

ImportAction.Description: This function returns the action of Import.
ImportAction.Name: ImportAction

ImportInfo.Description: This function is used to retrieve information of the import object.

Parameters.Keywords: Altered, Cancelled, Combined, Created, Deleted, Errors, Exceptions, Ignored

ImportInfo.Name: ImportInfo

ImportType.Description: This function returns the type of Import.
ImportType.Name: ImportType

InCapsuleMode.Description: This function is used to check if the Tally is running in capsule mode.
InCapsuleMode.Name: InCapsuleMode

InDeveloperMode.Description: This function is used to check if the Developer Mode is On.
InDeveloperMode.Name: InDeveloperMode

InFocusMode.Description: This function returns Yes if the specified tile from the Dashboard is currently in focus mode.
InFocusMode.Name: InFocusMode

InitValue.Description: This function can be used to initialize any value depending on datatype.
InitValue.Name: InitValue

InMigrationMode.Description: This function returns TRUE if Migration is in progress else returns FALSE.
InMigrationMode.Name: InMigrationMode

InWords.Description: This function converts the supplied Amount to Words. i.e., it gives the word equivalent of the supplied value. Format can be 'Forex', 'NoSymbol'.
InWords.Name: InWords

IsAutoReport.Description: This function returns TRUE if the report is run as Auto Report.
IsAutoReport.Name: IsAutoReport

IsBelongsTo.Description: This is used to check if the current object belongs to a specified object.
IsBelongsTo.Name: IsBelongsTo

IsBelongsToCategory.Description: This function checks if the current object belongs to the category which is passed as a parameter.
IsBelongsToCategory.Name: IsBelongsToCategory

IsCashLedger.Description: This function is used to check if the ledger belongs to group Cash-In-hand/Bank Accounts  or not.
IsCashLedger.Name: IsCashLedger

IsChequeRangeUsed.Description: This functions checks and returns if cheques in the given Cheque Range  have been used or not. This function be used to check if any cheque in the range is used OR all cheques in the range are used
IsChequeRangeUsed.Name: IsChequeRangeUsed

IsChildOf.Description: This function is used to check if the current object of a collection is child of the specified variable.
IsChildOf.Name: IsChildOf

IsChildOfCategory.Description: This function checks the current object is a child of the specified category or not.
IsChildOfCategory.Name: IsChildOfCategory

IsClassOf.Description: This function is used to check the specified class is belongs to the specified voucher type or not.
IsClassOf.Name: IsClassOf

IsCmpBaseCurrency.Description: This function is used to check whether the currency specified is the current company's base currency or not.
IsCmpBaseCurrency.Name: IsCmpBaseCurrency

IsCOMInterfaceInvokable.Description: This function checks whether a COM interface with the Name exists, and has been registered
IsCOMInterfaceInvokable.Name: IsCOMInterfaceInvokable

IsCompanyConnectable.Description: This function is used to check whether a company can be connected to Tally.NET Server or not.
IsCompanyConnectable.Name: IsCompanyConnectable

IsCompanyConnected.Description: This function is used to check whether a   company is in connected state or not.
IsCompanyConnected.Name: IsCompanyConnected

IsDebuggerOn.Description: This function is used to check if the Debugger is On Or OFF. Returns TRUE if Debugger is ON.
IsDebuggerOn.Name: IsDebuggerOn

IsDirectory.Description: This function is used to check the directory path is valid or not.
IsDirectory.Name: IsDirectory

IsDuplicate.Description: It checks the duplicate value for Some specific Fields.
IsDuplicate.Name: IsDuplicate

IsDuplicateInErrObj.Description: It checks the duplicate masters in error master list.
IsDuplicateInErrObj.Name: IsDuplicateInErrObj

IsFamilyAllowed.Description: This function returns true if the report is defined in an object which has access.
IsFamilyAllowed.Name: IsFamilyAllowed

IsGrpOfGrp.Description: It checks whether the given group is belongs to another group or is it independent one.
IsGrpOfGrp.Name: IsGrpOfGrp

IsGrpValidForRecompute.Description: Walks on the children of the Group/StockGroup recursively till it reaches ledger/stock item. If at least one of the leaf children (Ledger/Stock Item) is part of voucher then returns TRUE else returns FALSE
IsGrpValidForRecompute.Name: IsGrpValidForRecompute

IsKeyPresentInKeyValueMap.Description: This function is used to know if a given key exists in the Key value map definition
IsKeyPresentInKeyValueMap.Name: IsKeyPresentInKeyValueMap

IsLastOfSet.Description: This function is used to check whether the current form is last form to be printed or not.  If the particular form is last then it will return a True otherwise it is false.
IsLastOfSet.Name: IsLastOfSet

IsLedOfGrp.Description: The function checks if a given ledger belongs to a particular group or to any of the sub-groups under a particular group.
IsLedOfGrp.Name: IsLedOfGrp

IsMstNameDuplicate.Description: This function checks the duplicate value for the master's Name Field. It works only with default Master fields and Master Alias Field.
IsMstNameDuplicate.Name: IsMstNameDuplicate

IsObjectBelongsTo.Description: To check if the current object belongs to a specified object or not.
IsObjectBelongsTo.Name: IsObjectBelongsTo

IsObjectExists.Description: This function returns a logical value. This function can be used to check if object of given type and name is present in current company.
IsObjectExists.Name: IsObjectExists

IsProdTallyPrime.Description: This function is used to check whether the product is TallyPrime or not. It returns true if the product is TallyPrime.
IsProdTallyPrime.Name: IsProdTallyPrime

IsProdTallyPrimeEL.Description: This function is used to check whether the product is TallyPrime Edit Log or not. It returns true if the product is TallyPrime Edit Log.
IsProdTallyPrimeEL.Name: IsProdTallyPrimeEL

IsProdTallyServer.Description: This function is used to check whether the product is TallyPrime Server or not. It returns true if the product is TallyPrime Server.
IsProdTallyServer.Name: IsProdTallyServer

IsProfilerOn.Description: This function is used to check if the profiler is On Or OFF. Returns TRUE if Profiler is ON.
IsProfilerOn.Name: IsProfilerOn

IsRepeatVar.Description: The function is used to check whether the variable is repeated at report level or not.
IsRepeatVar.Name: IsRepeatVar

IsServiceInstalled.Description: This function is used to check if the specified service is installed on the system or not. It returns true if the service is installed.
IsServiceInstalled.Name: IsServiceInstalled

IsServiceRunning.Description: This function is used to check if the specified service is running or not.  It returns true if the service is running.
IsServiceRunning.Name: IsServiceRunning

IsStockLedger.Description: This function is used to check whether the ledger belongs to Stock-In-hand or not.
IsStockLedger.Name: IsStockLedger

IsSubReport.Description: This function returns TRUE if the report is run as Sub Report.
IsSubReport.Name: IsSubReport

IsTDLLoaded.Description: Returns whether given TDL is Loaded or Not
IsTDLLoaded.Name: IsTDLLoaded

IsUnicode.Description: This function returns 'Yes' if Unicode is supported else returns 'No'. It will return 'No' for Tally 7.2 and 'Yes' for all higher versions. This is used to check the multi-lingual facility provided.
IsUnicode.Name: IsUnicode

IsUnicodeSupported.Description: To check whether Unicode is supported or not.
IsUnicodeSupported.Name: IsUnicodeSupported

IsValidGSTIN.Description: This functgion validates whether given GSTIN is valid or not
IsValidGSTIN.Name: IsValidGSTIN

IsValidGSTINFormat.Description: This function checks to see if given GSTIN format is valid. It only checks correctness of GSTIN as per format
IsValidGSTINFormat.Name: IsValidGSTINFormat

IsValidGSTINFormatEx.Description: This function checks to see if given GSTIN format is valid. It checks correctness of GSTIN as per all the registration types.
IsValidGSTINFormatEx.Name: IsValidGSTINFormatEx

IsVchTypeOfFamily.Description: To check if the voucher belongs to a particular voucher-joint family or not.
IsVchTypeOfFamily.Name: IsVchTypeOfFamily

LastError.Description: It returns the last error string of action executed in a function.
LastError.Name: LastError

LastImportError.Description: This function returns Import error description for the last import done.
LastImportError.Name: LastImportError

LastResult.Description: It returns the Last action result executed in a function.
LastResult.Name: LastResult

LedgerProfit.Description: It gives the reserved Ledger Name Profit & Loss Account.
LedgerProfit.Name: LedgerProfit

ListCount.Description: This function is used to find the number of items present in the list variable.
ListCount.Name: ListCount

ListFind.Description: This function is used to find the specified key item in the list variable.
ListFind.Name: ListFind

ListIndex.Description: This function returns the index for the given the key.
ListIndex.Name: ListIndex

ListKey.Description: This function returns the key for the given  index.
ListKey.Name: ListKey

ListValue.Description: This function returns the value of the list variable for the specified key.
ListValue.Name: ListValue

ListValueEx.Description: It returns the returns the value of an element at the specified index in the list.
ListValueEx.Name: ListValueEx

ListValueFind.Description: This function is used to check if a given value exists in the list. If a given list has more than one same value, index can be used to retrieve the n'th matching value.
ListValueFind.Name: ListValueFind

LoopIndex.Description: This function returns the loop count.
LoopIndex.Name: LoopIndex

MakeExportName.Description: The function is used to create the Export File name according to the format specified using the parameters. The parameters include any string formula and format which is used for creation.
MakeExportName.Name: MakeExportName

MakeTallyUniqueID.Description: This function genarates the a 16 character Unique ID.
MakeTallyUniqueID.Name: MakeTallyUniqueID

MakeUniqueID.Description: This function genarates the Unique GUID.
MakeUniqueID.Name: MakeUniqueID

NumChildren.Description: It returns the number of children for the current object.
NumChildren.Name: NumChildren

NumLinesInScope.Description: This function is used to know how many lines were considered for any operation, since  various operations can be performed on multiple lines.
NumLinesInScope.Name: NumLinesInScope

ODBCName.Description: This function returns the ODBC Name of the currently used Object or Method.
ODBCName.Name: ODBCName

Param.Description: This function specifies the index of the parameter for the function EvalParamExp.
Param.Name: Param

PeriodDateFrom.Description: This function returns the starting date for the current auto column periodicity object.
PeriodDateFrom.Name: PeriodDateFrom

PeriodDateTo.Description: This function returns the ending date for the current auto column periodicity object.
PeriodDateTo.Name: PeriodDateTo

PrimaryCostCategory.Description: This function gives the default Cost Category Name. Name of the first 'Cost Category' of the Current Company.  The name of the Primary Cost Category of the Company.
PrimaryCostCategory.Name: PrimaryCostCategory

ReadINI.Description: The function is used to read the INI file and get value of any parameter in the INI.
ReadINI.Name: ReadINI

RecorderStatus.Description: This function returns the status of the Recorder. i.e. 'Started' , 'Stopped' , 'Paused'.
RecorderStatus.Name: RecorderStatus

RemoteUserID.Description: This function returns the current remote user for whom request is being processed.
RemoteUserID.Name: RemoteUserID

ScenarioValue.Description: The function is used to fetch the scenario value  for the particular group such as Actuals. .
ScenarioValue.Name: ScenarioValue

SellSpecRate.Description: This function gives the specified Selling Rate of a Foreign Currency for a particular Date Range as entered while creating the Foreign Currency in the Currency Master.
SellSpecRate.Name: SellSpecRate

SellTransRate.Description: This function gives the transaction rate for a particular date. Here the Date becomes the parameter and using this parameter the function will execute and return the transaction rate for a particular date range as entered while creating a Foreign Currency.
SellTransRate.Name: SellTransRate

ServerPort.Description: This function returns the current port number.
ServerPort.Name: ServerPort

SQLValue.Description: This function gives the SQL value for a column, used in Natural Language Interface. i.e., selected statement in direct commands. When we pass SQL command in Calculator panel it will fetch the data for the table we passed in SQL command.
SQLValue.Name: SQLValue

StdSpecRate.Description: This function is used to give the standard specified rate of the foreign currency.
StdSpecRate.Name: StdSpecRate

StdXchgRate.Description: This function gives the standard exchange rate of the foreign currency.
StdXchgRate.Name: StdXchgRate

TargetSyncCmpName.Description: This function returns the name of the target company to which the sync has to happen .
TargetSyncCmpName.Name: TargetSyncCmpName

TaxBillExists.Description: This function is used to check the existence of the Tax Bill.
TaxBillExists.Name: TaxBillExists

TgtFile.Description: Executes in context of Target File
TgtFile.Name: TgtFile

TgtObject.Description: This function is used to evaluate the value of expression in the context of target object.
TgtObject.Name: TgtObject

ToValue.Description: This function is used to get the value of a method in between a given date range($$FromValue:Date and $$ToValue:Date).This function is always used along with $$FromValue.
ToValue.Name: ToValue

ValType.Description: This function return the data type of the paramete passed.  This parameter can be a Variable name or Field name and this function returns its data type. If the parameter is the name of a field, then the type of that field is returned.
ValType.Name: ValType

VarKey.Description: This function is used to get list variable key value from current object context.
VarKey.Name: VarKey

XMLName.Description: This function XMLizes the specified string i.e. converts the string into uppercase and removes spaces.
XMLName.Name: XMLName
